com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter

Class GameAssetHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.GameAssetHandler

  • public class GameAssetHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to manage assets such as sounds, textures. Singleton Pattern
